component.name: Autocomplete Search
component.description: An autocomplete search input component that provides intelligent suggestion matching as users type their queries. Features dynamic result filtering, customizable suggestion rendering, keyboard navigation, and debounced search for efficient query input.

variants.name: Default
variants.description: A practical autocomplete implementation with responsive suggestions, clear matching highlights, efficient filtering, and smooth animations. Enhances search experience with helpful suggestions, keyboard shortcuts, and smooth suggestion navigation for better user experience.
